bedford-collection.Name: Avant  2 Drawer Nightstand -Mochaccino
bedford-collection.Body:
The Avant Nightstand is an ideal piece for those who want to create a modern look in their bedroom. With its bold slatted drawer fronts, brass-finished hardware and understructure, and contemporary white color, this nightstand is sure to create a striking aesthetic in your home. In addition, the nightstand has two ample storage drawers. As an added bonus, this item ships fully assembled!

Two drawers provide ample storage

Slats on drawer fronts give the nightstand a unique, modern look

3/4 extension side mount metal drawer slides.

Overall Dimensions : 21 " L x17 " W x 24" H

Overall Weight : 50 lbs.

Includes 2 Drawer(s) Dimensions are : 18.46" L x12" W x 3.94" H

Drawer Maximum Weight Capacity is 15 lbs.

Drawers have Stoppers - Yes

Minimal assembly required,  instructions are included

bedford-collection.Name: Avant  3 Drawer Dresser - Mochaccino
bedford-collection.Body:
With its modern linear aesthetic and beautiful Mochaccino finish, our "Avant 6 Drawer Dresser" is not only a feast for the eyes but also brings terrific function and usability to your home. The contrast of our brass finished metal legs and drawer pulls against the finish's richness only adds to the beauty. 

Slats on drawer fronts give the nightstand a unique, modern look

3/4 extension side mount metal drawer slides

Partial assembly required. Tip over restraint kit included

Overall Dimensions : 30.23 " L x19.01 " W x 33.97" H

Overall Weight : 92.78 lbs.

Includes 3 Drawer(s) Dimensions are : 28" L x16" W x 6" H

Maximum Drawer Weight Capacity is 20 lbs.

Drawers have Stoppers

Overall Dimensions : 60 " L x19 " W x 34" H

Overall Weight : 154.63 lbs.

Includes 6 Drawer(s) Dimensions are : 28" L x16" W x 6" H

Maximum Drawer Weight Capacity is 20 lbs.

cabinets.Name: Delancey 3 Door Cabinet - Black Matte
cabinets.Body:
Inspired by Indonesian handicrafts, the Delancey 3 Door Cabinet is a modern update that will enhance any room in your home. The beautiful wood-grain surface paired with natural woven rattan panels provides the perfect balance of materials. This cabinet offers ample storage space as well as a surface for displaying your favorite decorative accessories.

Striking rattan panel façade on each door

Includes 2 adjustable shelves capable of holding up to 20 lbs

Full assembly required

Provides 10.43 cubic feet of storage space

Overall Dimensions: 50.94" L x 15" W x 34.13" H 

Complete your room with the matching Delancey 2 Door Cabinet, Narrow Tall Cabinet and Narrow Short Cabinet

cabinets.Name: Delancey 2 Door Cabinet
cabinets.Body:
Inspired by Indonesian handicrafts, the Delancey 2-Door Cabinet is a modern update that will enhance any room in your home. The beautiful wood-grain surface paired with natural woven rattan panels provides the perfect balance of materials. This cabinet offers ample storage space as well as a surface for displaying your favorite decorative accessories. The Delancey Cabinet comes in two finishes, light and dark.

  • Natural woven rattan panels on doors
  • Adjustable shelf
  • Attractive wood-grain surface
  • Inspired by Indonesian handicrafts
  • Designed in New York City
  • Made in Indonesia
  • Made of Acacia Wood and MDF/Plywood with Mindi Wood Veneer
  • Some assembly required; screwdriver not included
  • Assembled dimensions: 34 in (L) x 15 in (D) x 34 in (H); 80 lbs

cabinets.Name: Pagoda Credenza
cabinets.Body:
Pagoda Credenza is a modern yet traditional update that will enhance any room in your home. The beautiful wood-grain surface paired with the brass hardware provides the perfect balance of materials. This credenza offers ample storage space as well as a surface for displaying your favorite decorative accessories. 

Our Antique Black finish is the perfect companion for this gorgeous Neoclassical design.

The sweeping top edge curves and striking turned legs adds to the elegance of this design.

Woven rattan panels give the nightstand a striking, mixed-material appeal

Overall dimensions 54"L x 17"W x 34.5"H

Includes 3 soft close doors 16.77"L x 14.21"W x 12.75"H

3 adjustable shelves for ample storage, up to 15lb weight capacity each

Minimal assembly is required, tools are included

Finished backing for a clean and complete look.

dressers.Name: Sophia 6 Drawer Dresser
dressers.Body:
Our elegant Sophia Dresser, with its striking finish and woven rattan panels, is sure to enhance any bedroom environment. The textural quality of the rattan panels brings visual interest to this beautiful nightstand. In addition, the black finish is set off strikingly by the contrasting brass finish on the metal understructure and the handles. With six drawers, this dresser has plenty of storage for clothing and other items. As an added bonus, this item ships fully assembled! Complete your Sophia bedroom collection with our matching 2 Drawer Nightstand and 3 Drawer Chest.

  • Six drawers provide ample storage
  • Woven rattan panels give the chest a striking, mixed-material appeal
  • Finish of wood surface makes attractive contrast with brass finish of metal base
  • Available in black, light blond, or grey
  • No assembly required
  • Tip-over restraint included
  • Designed in New York City
  • Made in Indonesia
  • Made of Acacia Wood, Rattan, Mindi Wood Veneer, Plywood, MDF, and Steel
  • Dimensions: 60" W x 19" D x 34" H; 150 lbs

dressers.Name: Pagoda Credenza
dressers.Body:
Pagoda Credenza is a modern yet traditional update that will enhance any room in your home. The beautiful wood-grain surface paired with the brass hardware provides the perfect balance of materials. This credenza offers ample storage space as well as a surface for displaying your favorite decorative accessories. 

Our Antique Black finish is the perfect companion for this gorgeous Neoclassical design.

The sweeping top edge curves and striking turned legs adds to the elegance of this design.

Woven rattan panels give the nightstand a striking, mixed-material appeal

Overall dimensions 54"L x 17"W x 34.5"H

Includes 3 soft close doors 16.77"L x 14.21"W x 12.75"H

3 adjustable shelves for ample storage, up to 15lb weight capacity each

Minimal assembly is required, tools are included

Finished backing for a clean and complete look.

dressers.Name: Delancey 3 Door Cabinet - Light Blonde
dressers.Body:
Inspired by Indonesian handicrafts, the Delancey 3 Door Cabinet is a modern update that will enhance any room in your home. The beautiful wood-grain surface paired with natural woven rattan panels provides the perfect balance of materials. This cabinet offers ample storage space as well as a surface for displaying your favorite decorative accessories.

Striking rattan panel façade on each door

Includes 2 adjustable shelves capable of holding up to 20 lbs

Full assembly required

Provides 10.43 cubic feet of storage space

Overall Dimensions: 50.94" L x 15" W x 34.13" H 

Complete your room with the matching Delancey 2 Door Cabinet, Narrow Tall Cabinet and Narrow Short Cabinet

nightstands.Name: Sophia 2 Drawer Nightstand
nightstands.Body:
Our elegant Sophia Nightstand, with its matte finish and woven rattan panels, is sure to enhance any bedside environment. The textural quality of the rattan panels brings visual interest to this beautiful nightstand. In addition, the attractive finish is set off strikingly by the contrasting brass finish on the metal under-structure and the handles. Two drawers offer convenient bedside storage. 

  • Two drawers provide ample storage
  • Woven rattan panels give the nightstand a striking, mixed-material appeal
  • Wood surface makes attractive contrast with brass finish of metal base
  • Designed in New York City
  • Made in Indonesia
  • Some assembly required; all tools and hardware included
  • Assembled dimensions: 22 in (L) x 15.75 in (D) x 25 in (H); 40 lbs
  • Made of Acacia Wood, Rattan, MDF with Mindi Wood Veneer, and Steel

nightstands.Body:

The textural quality of the rattan panels brings visual interest to this beautiful nightstand. nightstands.Name: Avant  2 Drawer Nightstand -Mochaccino
nightstands.Body:
The Avant Nightstand is an ideal piece for those who want to create a modern look in their bedroom. With its bold slatted drawer fronts, brass-finished hardware and understructure, and contemporary white color, this nightstand is sure to create a striking aesthetic in your home. In addition, the nightstand has two ample storage drawers. As an added bonus, this item ships fully assembled!

Two drawers provide ample storage

Slats on drawer fronts give the nightstand a unique, modern look

sophia-collection.Name: Sophia 6 Drawer Dresser
sophia-collection.Body:
Our elegant Sophia Dresser, with its striking finish and woven rattan panels, is sure to enhance any bedroom environment. The textural quality of the rattan panels brings visual interest to this beautiful nightstand. In addition, the black finish is set off strikingly by the contrasting brass finish on the metal understructure and the handles. With six drawers, this dresser has plenty of storage for clothing and other items. As an added bonus, this item ships fully assembled! Complete your Sophia bedroom collection with our matching 2 Drawer Nightstand and 3 Drawer Chest.

  • Six drawers provide ample storage
  • Woven rattan panels give the chest a striking, mixed-material appeal
  • Finish of wood surface makes attractive contrast with brass finish of metal base
  • Available in black, light blond, or grey
  • No assembly required
  • Tip-over restraint included
  • Designed in New York City
  • Made in Indonesia
  • Made of Acacia Wood, Rattan, Mindi Wood Veneer, Plywood, MDF, and Steel
  • Dimensions: 60" W x 19" D x 34" H; 150 lbs

sophia-collection.Name: Sophia 3 Drawer Chest
sophia-collection.Body:
Our elegant Sophia Chest, with its matte black finish and woven rattan panels, is sure to enhance any bedroom environment. The textural quality of the rattan panels brings visual interest to this beautiful nightstand. In addition, the black finish is set off strikingly by the contrasting brass finish on the metal understructure and the handles. Three drawers offer ample storage. Complete your Sophia bedroom collection with our matching 2 Drawer Nightstand and 6 Drawer Dresser.

  • Three drawers provide ample storage
  • Woven rattan panels give the chest a striking, mixed-material appeal
  • Matte black finish of wood surface makes attractive contrast with brass finish of metal base
  • No assembly required
  • Tip-over restraint included
  • Designed in New York City
  • Made in Indonesia
  • Made of Acacia Wood, Rattan, Mindi Wood Veneer, Plywood, MDF, and Steel
  • Dimensions: 30" L x 19" W x 34" H 70 lbs
